### getEncodedNumVGPRBlocks() {#acbef36ba440334c992cd0f6487143da0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::AMDGPU::IsaInfo::getEncodedNumVGPRBlocks (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI, unsigned NumVGPRs, std::optional&lt; bool &gt; EnableWavefrontSize32=std::nullopt)</>}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Number of VGPR blocks needed for given subtarget <code>STI</code> when <code>NumVGPRs</code> are used. We actually return the number of blocks -1, since that&#39;s what we encode.
</SectionUser>

For subtargets which support it, <code>EnableWavefrontSize32</code> should match the ENABLE&#95;WAVEFRONT&#95;SIZE32 kernel descriptor field.

### getMaxWavesPerEU() {#a41a62eaa48728ca1d52dda5d0a9b08c1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::AMDGPU::IsaInfo::getMaxWavesPerEU (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI)</>}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
